amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require all paper ballots used in an election for Federal office to be printed in the US on paper manufactured in the US.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Kim.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kim amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.
